mapper.select: SELECT D.LINE_CD, D.EDCTS_CD, D.INDICA_CNT, D.ORDER_CNT, D.WK_FR_DT, E.PRDT_NM, I.INDICA_DT, I.PREF_RANK, I.PLAN_CD, P.ORDER_NO,D.WK_FR_DT FROM INDICA_DTL D JOIN EDCTS E ON D.EDCTS_CD = E.EDCTS_CD JOIN INDICA I ON I.INDICA_DT = D.INDICA_DT JOIN PLAN P ON I.PLAN_CD = P.PLAN_CD WHERE I.NOW_ST = '미지시'
SELECT B.PRCS_CD, P.PRCS_NM, E.EQM_CD, E.EQM_NM FROM BOM B JOIN PRCS P ON B.PRCS_CD = P.PRCS_CD JOIN EQM E ON P.PRCS_CD = E.PRCS_CD WHERE EDCTS_CD = #{edctsCd} ORDER BY B.BOM_SQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DUM VALUES (#{eqmCd}, NULL, NULL, 'Y', #{seqNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_SHEET SET PROG_APPE = '생산완료' WHERE ORDER_NO =#{orderNo}
UPDATE EQM SET USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE LINE_CD =#{lineCd}
UPDATE EQM SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE LINE_CD =#{lineCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRCS_PROG_INFER VALUES ( #{inferCnt}, (select ccd_dtl from (select * from ccds_dtl where ccd='PNF' order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where rownum = 1), #{indicaDt}, #{prcsCd}, #{planCd} )
mapper.select:
SELECT P.*, E.EQM_CD, E.EQM_NM, I.INFER_CD FROM PRCS_PROG P JOIN EQM E ON E.PRCS_CD = P.PRCS_CD JOIN PLAN_DTL D ON P.PLAN_CD = D.PLAN_CD JOIN PRCS_PROG_INFER I ON P.PLAN_CD = I.PLAN_CD
WHERE D.WK_FR_DT >= #{wkFrDt} AND D.WK_FR_DT <= #{wkFrDt2}
and p.prcs_cd LIKE #{prcsCd}||'%'
and i.infer_cd = #{inferCd} and p.infer_cnt > 0
mapper.update: update dum set yn = 'N' where seq_no >= (SELECT min(seq_no) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY seq_no) FROM dum where yn = 'Y')
update dum set yn = 'Y' where seq_no >= (SELECT min(seq_no) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY seq_no) FROM dum where yn = 'N') and (WK_TO_TM is null or WK_FR_TM is null)
mapper.select: select eqm_cd from dum where yn = 'N' and wk_to_tm is null
